name: Let's Boom!!!
description:
This is a little web painting game designed for children aged from 4-8, the first step is to choose your favorite balloons and put them on the canvas, every balloon attached with a different splashed pattern, when the player is ready to dart them out, they will see a pattern painting on the canvas! The picture you painted can be saved as your own image. 

Project Goal:

The first and most important goal for this project is to enhance the children’s interest in on-line painting. Moreover, this little game is also designed for kid’s entertainment, to transform a boring painting into a funny game. During the process of experience, children will practice their imagination of painting skills. Considering children aged from 4-8 are beginners for using the computer, the rules won’t be too complicated to understand. Parents can help their children save the picture and print them out and keep those images as a souvenir for children’s memories.
